TopicTitle: Scrolling the Parts Manager With the Mouse Scroll Wheel Also Zooms the View in and Out During Flight

Articles.Content:
Scrolling through the parts manager, resource manager, or any other pop up window will zoom the camera. One should be in control at a time. 

Side note: Please bring back single part windows. They could work hand in hand, there doesn't need to be ONLY the parts manager. 

Edited July 9, 2023 by Anth12

Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Linux Ubuntu 20.04.6 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3400G | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti | RAM: 16GB

Description:  The title says it all.  Scrolling the parts manager with the mouse scroll wheel also zooms the view in and out during flight.  While the mouse is over the parts manager window the scroll wheel should only cause the parts manager to scroll up and down.  The zoom level of the view should not change.
